The ‘stealth omicron’ subvariant is in the Bay Area. Here’s what you need to know

A new subvariant of the COVID-19 omicron variant — BA.2, or “stealth” omicron — has been detected in the Bay Area. While little is yet known about the subvariant, health experts said the mutation does not present any immediate health concerns, particularly for vaccinated, boosted Bay Area residents.

Analysis: Black woman on Supreme Court is good for country, Biden’s future

JOE GAROFOLI: President Joe Biden’s pledge to nominate a Black woman to fill a Supreme Court vacancy is important not only because Black women are the Democratic Party’s most loyal voters — but because a Black woman’s life experience has never been represented on the nation’s highest court.
